languages.text: "Изящный ход, Ваша Светлость. Другие семейства будут думать, что вас и дома несогласных связывают более сложные отношения, а возмутители спокойствия получат сигнал о том, что к ним приглядываются".

traits.locale_text: "Изящный ход, Ваша Светлость. Другие семейства будут думать, что вас и дома несогласных связывают более сложные отношения, а возмутители спокойствия получат сигнал о том, что к ним приглядываются".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive the message that they are being watched."
languages.original_text: "Изящный ход, Ваша Светлость. Другие семейства будут думать, что вас и дома несогласных связывают более сложные отношения, а возмутители спокойствия получат сигнал о том, что к ним приглядываются".

traits.locale_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive a message that they are being watched."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive a message that they are being watched."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive the message that they are being watched."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive the message that they are being watched."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive the message that they are being watched."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “真是个优雅的解决方案，大人。其他家族会认为，您与那些家族的关系比人们想象的要复杂得多。而煽动那些家族的人，也会明白您已经盯上他们了。”
languages.original_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive the message that they are being watched."

traits.locale_text: “真是个优雅的解决方案，大人。其他家族会认为，您与那些家族的关系比人们想象的要复杂得多。而煽动那些家族的人，也会明白您已经盯上他们了。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Es una solución elegante, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Las otras familias supondrán que su relación con las casas díscolas son más complejas de lo que aparentan, mientras que los agitadores entenderán que les están vigilando».
languages.original_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive the message that they are being watched."

traits.locale_text: «Es una solución elegante, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Las otras familias supondrán que su relación con las casas díscolas son más complejas de lo que aparentan, mientras que los agitadores entenderán que les están vigilando».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「気品溢れる解決策ですな、陛下。他の家系には対立的な家との関係が想像以上に複雑であるとアピールし、扇動者たちは自分たちが監視されているというメッセージを受け取るに違いないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive the message that they are being watched."

traits.locale_text: 「気品溢れる解決策ですな、陛下。他の家系には対立的な家との関係が想像以上に複雑であるとアピールし、扇動者たちは自分たちが監視されているというメッセージを受け取るに違いないでしょう」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Eine elegante Lösung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Andere Familien werden annehmen, dass Eure Beziehung zu den aufsässigen Häusern komplizierter ist als gedacht, und die Aufwiegler werden begreifen, dass sie unter Beobachtung stehen."
languages.original_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive the message that they are being watched."

traits.locale_text: "Eine elegante Lösung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Andere Familien werden annehmen, dass Eure Beziehung zu den aufsässigen Häusern komplizierter ist als gedacht, und die Aufwiegler werden begreifen, dass sie unter Beobachtung stehen."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Une solution des plus élégantes, Votre Seigneurie. Ainsi, les autres familles croiront que vous entretenez des liens bien plus compliqués qu'il n'y paraît avec les contestataires, et ces derniers sauront que vous les avez à l'œil. »
languages.original_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive the message that they are being watched."

traits.locale_text: « Une solution des plus élégantes, Votre Seigneurie. Ainsi, les autres familles croiront que vous entretenez des liens bien plus compliqués qu'il n'y paraît avec les contestataires, et ces derniers sauront que vous les avez à l'œil. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Zarif bir çözüm {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Diğer aileler, hoşnutsuz hanelerle aranızdaki ilişkinin ilk başta göründüğünden daha komplike olduğunu varsayacak ve provokatörlere gözlem altında oldukları mesajı verilecek."
languages.original_text: "An elegant solution, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Other families will assume that your relationships with the defiant houses are more complicated than one might think, and the agitators will receive the message that they are being watched."

traits.locale_text: "Zarif bir çözüm {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Diğer aileler, hoşnutsuz hanelerle aranızdaki ilişkinin ilk başta göründüğünden daha komplike olduğunu varsayacak ve provokatörlere gözlem altında oldukları mesajı verilecek."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
